review: I have about five Apple TVs, and really love the new version that allows you to not only get iTunes media but also Netflix, Hulu Plus, HBO, ESPN and a bunch of other networks. Would love to see them add CNN or a news channel (other than BBC) to the lineup.  I can't give an opinion on how this compares to any of the other streaming devices, but I really love it.  Simple. Easy.  Actually follows the theoretical Apple philosophy of "just works" for once.
author: J. Rand

review: This product is so easy to use! I originally purchased a roku but could not get it connect correctly on my college network. I returned it and switched to Apple TV. This has worked out great with the new multi-monitor support with Apple's new Maverick OS. I have used it successfully with my macbook pro with retina display.
